Name: React Frontend Developer
Brief: Build modern React components for our web applications
Description: We're looking for a skilled React developer to help build and maintain our web applications. You'll work with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and modern React patterns including hooks and context. Experience with SSG frameworks like Vike or Next.js is a plus.

Name: UI/UX Designer
Brief: Design beautiful and intuitive user interfaces
Description: Help us create stunning, user-friendly interfaces for our meditation apps and websites. You'll work closely with developers to ensure designs are implemented pixel-perfect. Figma experience required.

Name: Backend Developer
Description: Develop and maintain our backend services using Node.js and cloud platforms. Experience with Cloudflare Workers, serverless functions, and REST APIs required.

Name: Content Writer
Description: Create compelling, SEO-friendly content for our websites and apps. Experience writing about meditation, wellness, or spirituality is highly valued.

Name: Mobile App Developer
Description: Build and maintain our React Native mobile applications for iOS and Android. Experience with app store deployment and push notifications is a plus.

Name: DevOps Engineer
Description: Set up and maintain our deployment pipelines, monitoring, and cloud infrastructure. Experience with Cloudflare, GitHub Actions, and containerization required.

Name: Video Editor
Description: Edit and produce high-quality video content for our platforms. Experience with Adobe Premiere or Final Cut Pro required. Motion graphics skills are a bonus.

Name: Translation Coordinator
Description: Manage our translation workflows and coordinate with volunteer translators worldwide. Must be detail-oriented and experienced with localization processes.

Name: QA Tester
Description: Help ensure quality by testing our web and mobile applications. Write test cases, report bugs, and verify fixes. Attention to detail is essential.

Name: Community Manager
Description: Manage our social media presence and engage with our community of meditators. Experience with social media management tools and analytics required.
